title: Comment on Uh oh‚Ä¶ The escort has pictures by Sexy time
text:
Indianapolis Business Journal 
Well this isn‚Äôt good for Louisville‚Ä¶ 
‚ÄúBreaking Cardinal Rules‚Äù comes with photos backing up the madame‚Äôs claims that she slept with UofL players and recruits for money. The Indianapolis Business Journal just shared one on Twitter, and says there is more to see inside the book. 
Now if you‚Äôll excuse me, I have some pre-ordering to do‚Ä¶ Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 53 responses to ‚ÄúUh oh‚Ä¶ The escort has pictures‚Äù catdaddyd October 2, 2015 at 7:21 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Is he flashing a gang sign? 
Chill, Chill, Chill Kill, Kill, Kill PittyPat October 2, 2015 at 7:21 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Chane on you! October 2, 2015 at 7:25 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Case closed. This pic proves everything!!! Parvenu October 2, 2015 at 7:29 pm | Permalink 
Yes, good approach-come on strong. But, real bad stuff is about to rain down big-time on your beloved program. Brian October 2, 2015 at 7:33 pm | Permalink 
These are the same people who believe that Cal hands recruits dufflebags full of cash, tho‚Ä¶ Cheryl October 2, 2015 at 7:29 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I was having a really bad day until about 4:30 UKinIN October 2, 2015 at 7:30 pm | Permalink | Reply 
As much as I want to laugh about this the cynic in me thinks that this probably goes on everywhere and we should quietly enjoy this and not draw unwanted attention of our own programs. CATandMONKEY October 2, 2015 at 7:33 pm | Permalink 
If we ignore the biggest story on ESPN tonight, this will quietly go away. LMAO October 2, 2015 at 7:34 pm | Permalink 
#L1CWhore!! üòâ Have a great weekend!! catdaddyd October 2, 2015 at 7:36 pm | Permalink 
No question this goes on everywhere. Be it these paid ho‚Äôs, or the hostesses that show them around on their visits to the campuses. Why do you think football players who have committed to schools take visits to the other schools. SarahF October 2, 2015 at 8:08 pm | Permalink 
I personally know cheerleaders at the University of Louisville, University of Kentucky, and Morehead State University and out of those three I can honestly say UK has the highest standards when it comes to team athletes. I‚Äôve heard stories of Louisville cheer coaches partying with their cheerleaders and taking lots of drugs (the overdose of their teammate last year further proves this), Morehead cheerleaders have been seen chugging beers before camps, practices, and games, yet nothing from UK. It may go on everywhere but from what I‚Äôve seen, UK is pretty strict when it comes to things like this. (Or maybe they‚Äôre just good at hiding it?) DesignatedDrinker October 2, 2015 at 7:32 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Question, why is the pic in black and white? They not have color ink in Indiana yet? PittyPat October 2, 2015 at 7:35 pm | Permalink 
They have a time machine at UofL. Secondary violations. therealbigjon October 2, 2015 at 7:36 pm | Permalink 
All the dye they would use for color ink is used to make all those awesome banners. CATandMONKEY October 2, 2015 at 7:52 pm | Permalink 
It reminds them of those old B&W photos of when their team was last relevant. October 2, 2015 at 7:34 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I‚Äôm only going to read it for the articles. SMH October 2, 2015 at 7:36 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I assumed they were talking about female prostitutes. But Dude looks like a lady! catdaddyd October 2, 2015 at 7:38 pm | Permalink 
I thought the same thing. Living on the down low in the ville. harry October 2, 2015 at 7:46 pm | Permalink 
UofL is an equal opportunity employer, please do not discriminate male prostitutes were hired as well. Sabion October 2, 2015 at 7:39 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Anyone have a link to order one? I think I‚Äôm buying these for Christmas presents. catdaddyd October 2, 2015 at 7:40 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Remember that time Siva stuck his finger up his teammates butt. harry October 2, 2015 at 7:43 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Let me get some pop corn, this gonna be good. Dirty Laundry October 2, 2015 at 7:43 pm | Permalink | Reply 
UKinIN, no deflection, no trying to share blame dirty birds have earned their name. I wonder if she also has football players and recruits pics as well? 
Designated Drinker I think there will be plenty of color, some black, but mostly red going forward. What a beautiful finish to a dismal day! KC88 October 2, 2015 at 7:44 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Oh sick, this is embarrassing lol‚Äì they couldn‚Äôt even find an attractive hooker?! harry October 2, 2015 at 7:51 pm | Permalink 
depends on the budget, coaches got get some too. Your are looking at about 100 clients between the football, basketball, and the coaching staff math can add up real quick. Diry Laundry October 2, 2015 at 7:50 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I just thought of something, the dirty birds will be coming to UK for football and basketball. Sounds like fun! Wanda Shepherd October 2, 2015 at 7:52 pm | Permalink | Reply 
The ‚Äúhooker budget‚Äù must have been minimal! harry October 2, 2015 at 7:56 pm | Permalink 
They were collecting donations at the gas pumps, if I remember. harry October 2, 2015 at 7:55 pm | Permalink | Reply 
so lets see basketball and football coaches involved in sex scandals and the now players. Lord knows how many skeletons Tom Jurich has in his closet. Stormin October 2, 2015 at 7:58 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I can see the posters now, ‚ÄúYou play for UL, and all In you‚Äôll get is screwed!‚Äù Ed has Tickets October 2, 2015 at 8:01 pm | Permalink | Reply 
My UofL buddy just sent me a text ‚Äúclearly with the recruits we get, the sex wasn‚Äôt that great.‚Äù Ron Bolin October 2, 2015 at 8:03 pm | Permalink | Reply 
It still remains to be proven. I say let NCAA handle it. As a true blue fan I choose to not pass judgement until facts are in. We know what is like to be under sanctions. harry October 2, 2015 at 8:03 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I it will interesting to see how Pitino/Petrino (not sure if football is involved)dodge this bullet, this puts Final Four, National Championship, and their football achievements in serious jeopardy. Catalina wine Mixer
